title: Interpretation of a black mouse in a dream: Seeing a black mouse in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the mouse, its color is black, for single girls, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for married or unmarried people, it either chases me, attacks me, catches me, kills me, beats me, eats meat and more. According to Ibn Sirin, the black mouse in a dream is one of the most disturbing visions and dreams that appear to us in a series of different images that cause us great discomfort and anxiety in order to obtain its correct interpretation, as the mouse in life exists in many colors, including gray, which is the main color of mice. . Among them is the black color, which is the most dangerous mouse of all and causes many problems, including the white color, which is one of the local species that is raised in the homes of many people around the world. Or not: The interpretation of a mouse in a dream in general is that it does not express goodness or anything good. It denotes health and indicates the presence of material losses such as loss and disappointment in practical life. The person who sees a mouse in a dream feels as if he has nothing at all and that everything he possesses has been lost, which means that this vision indicates a real material loss. Seeing a mouse indicates in The dream also indicates the isolation of a spiteful woman and jealousy in a person’s life. On the other hand, seeing many mice in a dream indicates livelihood. Seeing many mice running around in the house means that there is a great blessing in the life of the dreamer, while at the same time it indicates a lack of Livelihoods within a year. If a person sees a rat coming out of a place in a dream, this vision expresses a lack of livelihood blessings. But if you see rats in dreams that occur during the day, this means a long life. Catching rats in a dream indicates the presence of a jealous and spiteful woman. A drain rat expresses Health is about a person's fear and anxiety in the world. The narrator also avoids harm from his enemies present in his environment, and thus lives in fear, and sometimes he also expresses his regret for some small problems. Seeing a mouse is interpreted according to the dreamer’s condition and in general, a mouse in a dream means an unjust person, and marrying a hypocritical person with two faces and having Harm from it. A house mouse in a dream means the fall of a woman. Seeing large numbers of mice means a long life. Playing with a mouse in a dream means thinking about this world and forgetting the afterlife. Seeing a mouse entering the house in a dream means that it is connected to a woman who appears in the form of an angel and the fact that she is a devil. Chasing a mouse means marrying a deceitful woman and the mouse coming out. From any angle, it means the presence of a child, and the presence of a mouse in the bed means adultery. Seeing a mouse indicates that there is good in the life of the dreamer, and it also indicates that there are people who want to benefit from the dreamer’s wealth and push their limits. It means the man with an evil heart and the one with tricks and conspiracies, and that the person Whoever met a mouse in a dream will meet a person with a bad heart, as we mentioned in real life. Seeing a mouse in the house means that there is an enemy entering and leaving your home as a friend of that cunning person who hides his true face. The vision indicates the presence of a harmful enemy among relatives.

The vision indicates the presence of a harmful enemy among relatives.

title: Interpretation of a dream about dancing: In a dream, I dreamed of dancing

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of dancing for a married woman without music at a wedding, and dancing with a pregnant woman. The concept of dancing in a dream. Interpreters and scholars interpreted the vision of dancing in a dream on the basis of moral and religious principles and teachings, as it was said that dancing is one of unpleasant visions, as it symbolizes fatigue, pain and effort, and is a sign of... Fun. . Following whims and falsification, or feeling lost, unstable, and self-realization. As for the interpretation of the dream of dancing according to the Western school, it indicates success and success, whether in work, marriage, or study, and it can indicate a special trip if the dreamer appears in his dream as if he is dancing with skill and merit. Music melodies. Dancing in a single girl’s dream. Seeing an unmarried girl dancing in a dream to loud popular songs, or seeing her dancing an oriental dance, is an indication of the worries that will plague her in the coming period. As for a single girl dancing to Lebanese songs such as Dabke, it is a sign On a positive change in her life that will lead to success and great success, God willing. As for seeing an unmarried girl in her dream dancing with someone she knows or a foreigner, to foreign tunes such as slow dancing, this indicates an emotional connection that can lead to engagement or marriage, if she sees that she She dances in a good style and with elaborate movements. Interpretation of a dream about dancing for a married woman in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. As for dancing: it indicates distress and calamity, and dancing for a sick person indicates the duration of his illness, due to the decomposition and lightness of the dancer’s body, and as for a boy dancing, it indicates that the boy is. He is deaf and mute, and if he wants something, he shows it with his hand and it is in the form of a dance. The dancer has a disaster that he shares with the dancer. As for a married woman who sees herself in a dream dancing alone to loud songs, for example, this may indicate tension in her marital and family relationships or problems that she or her husband faces in living and material matters. As for seeing her while She is dancing accompanied by her husband or one of her children in a married woman’s dream. This vision indicates justice in the situation of the home and children, stopping disturbances, and feeling comfortable after a lot of fatigue and toil. Dancing in a dream about pregnancy. A pregnant woman dancing to calm and beautiful tunes in her dream is an indication of her safety and the safety of her fetus. Her pregnancy period is final. It can also predict a natural birth or the balance in which one lives during the current period. Dancing in a dream of a divorced woman and a widowDancing in a dream of a divorced woman and a widow is an unpleasant vision, especially if she sees herself dancing in public places, as this vision reflects the sympathy, deprivation, and sadness that she is experiencing. Dancing in Dream of a Man: Seeing a man dancing in a dream is a sign and reflection of happiness and joy, especially if the man is dancing in harmony and balance, and his dancing is accompanied by a handkerchief or a stick in his hands. It is not good to see men swaying or dancing while women are dancing, as this dream indicates Weakness, disappointment, weakness, fatigue and weakness that affect the dreamer in achieving his dream. Group dancing in a dreamMasculine

title: Interpretation of seeing a passport in a dream and a visa in a dream

preview.html: A passport for single women, for married women, for pregnant women, whether renewal, loss, forgetfulness, rupture, rupture. I dreamed of traveling to a country according to Ibn Sirin’s passport. The passport is basically linked to the idea of ​​change, transformations, and moving from one state to another, which are the concepts that travel in a dream refers to in general. The word “passport” “Safar” is derived from “permit” or “permit” and refers to license and permission. A passport indicates protection and security for its bearer or owner in a dream. Extracting it may indicate the fulfillment of desires. Losing a passport in a dream represents wandering or loss and lack of vigilance. The girl who sees in her dream She gets a new passport, she often receives a happy event, especially if she sees in this passport a beautiful, clear or bright picture. A passport in a person’s dream indicates many issues and perhaps it is one of the harbingers of success or achieving goals. The word “passport” It is very close in form and pronunciation to the word or phrase “marriage” and we often confuse it in reading or writing. This is why some interpreters consider a passport in a dream to be similar or a marriage contract or similar to a marriage contract in waking life. Especially if its data is registered in Arabic and the color of the passport in the dream is green. This interpretation states that one sees a person’s signature on this passport or sees his fingerprints on one of its pages. As for an unmarried woman who sees in her dream that a policeman looks at her passport, examines it or verifies its authenticity, and then returns it to her with a gentle smile, this is interpreted as... It is success in study or work. Perhaps the dream indicates finding an important job opportunity or something similar. A passport in a married woman’s dream indicates protection and security, especially in matters related to income and living. A married woman’s passport in her dream indicates protection from any harm or evil, especially if she sees that she keeps it in a safe place such as a desk drawer or a cupboard. A new passport in a dream heralds a new and happy event for a married woman, such as ownership or ownership of a property or a car. . Most likely, a new passport indicates the possession of money, especially if the color of this passport is green because this color on papers, documents and contracts indicates money. Seeing a passport in a pregnant woman’s dream means salvation from problems or pains and is ultimately good news for the fulfillment of a wish. . The principle of interpretation goes back to the wording because the word passport means permission and the word journey means moving from one state to a state better than that. If an unmarried person sees in a dream that he is obtaining a passport, then he may get married or live from travel or traveling. A passport in a dream is considered... A man has a good omen if he sees the color green and it indicates the benefit or interest that is spent with God’s grace and help. A lost or misplaced passport is not good in a man’s dream because it may indicate loss of job, social or financial stability. Seeing a diplomatic passport is very welcome. She initially confirms the

title: Interpretation of dreams about stealing gold The meaning of stolen gold in a dream

preview.html: GoneInterpretation of a dream about stealing a gold necklace for a pregnant womanI dreamed that I stole goldInterpretation of a dream about stolen gold and moneyInterpretation of a dream about recovering stolen goldIf a person sees himself stealing from someone he knows in a dream, this may mean that this person speaks ill of him. This journey. Losing gold in a dream is good, because gold in a dream is evil and envy, and losing it means keeping away from you. And if someone sees someone stealing his wife’s gold in a dream, this may mean that this thief provides him with benefit, kindness, and abundance, and in the case of seeing someone stealing his own money, It may mean that he is giving him a large sum of money. An amount of money. Meaning of a dream about stealing gold: Seeing gold stolen could mean that the dreamer is afraid of his money being stolen or that he is afraid of the unknown future, and anyone who dreams of someone stealing gold from him could indicate that he is getting money stolen from him. In a dream to the same degree, and it may indicate good and good things that the dreamer actually gets because of this praiseworthy vision, which is stealing money from him. A dream of stealing gold for a married woman. A married woman who sees in a dream that she has stolen a specific thing in a dream, this may mean that she is stealing happy moments. In life and wants to live a happy life full of happiness, psychological comfort and peace. If he sees himself stealing something and escaping from the police, this may indicate that he enjoys living in peace and psychological comfort for a period of time. If she sees that her gold has been stolen in a dream, it may mean This means that she is entering a stage full of marital problems between her and her husband, full of arguments and disturbances that affect calm. And family stability between spouses. A pregnant woman dreams of stealing gold. A pregnant woman who dreams of gold being stolen from her, this may indicate that she will give birth to a female, just as stealing in a dream can mean a pregnant woman’s favorite things. Stealing in a dream has many meanings of comfort, kindness, and food, but If a pregnant woman sees someone stealing money from her, this may indicate that she is facing pregnancy problems that affect her and expose her to feelings of pain. A man dreaming of stealing gold: A man who sees in his dream that he is stealing gold may indicate that he will get married soon and will be able to achieve the goal he is pursuing. Stealing from a safe in a dream denotes adultery and usury, and the thief in a dream is the angel of death, may God bless him and grant him peace. Whether he is known or well-known, the thief benefits from the stolen knowledge, art, or word. If he sees an unknown thief entering his house and stealing his cell, his wife will die. Likewise, if he steals His blanket, jacket, or whatever is attributed to that thing among women. The theft of gold indicates the death of his family, and if the stolen item is attributed to the servants, then if he sees that he has stolen dirhams and is known, then it is gossip. If he is unknown and old, then his friend is betraying him, and if he is young, then his enemy is betraying him. Theft is praiseworthy and is evidence Good except for those who want to be deceived. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight in a dream

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, a topic for interpreting the dream of seeing a fight in a dream. Fighting is one of the issues in life that causes disputes and disputes between people, and they can be ordinary fights or serious fights because of the sensitivity of the topic that caused them. The dream world carries with it the repercussions and events of the real world, but There are many of us who are disturbed by dream visions and seek to interpret them. A quarrel in a dream can affect some people who suffer from anxiety, fear, and fear that something will happen in reality, especially if the quarrel is in a family or work environment, because fighting is a crisis that will befall the viewer, so He doesn't. Know which direction you will come from.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fight in a dream. Most scholars and interpreters argued that seeing a fight in a dream is a state of psychological liberation that the dreamer needs and a kind of liberation from desires that he cannot achieve in reality. Quarrel with the dead in a dream. Dream about quarreling with the dead is one of the dreams A bad deed that warns its owner of crises. But if the dispute in the dream is with a deceased person who is famous for his piety and justice, then this is evidence that the dreamer is walking on the path of deception and temptation, and he must stay away from disobedience and abstain from the disobedience that he is committing. He insists on. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel with relatives. Relatives mean in a dream the people of your home and your family. If the quarrel is with the father and mother in the dream and they are both dead, then this is a warning to the person that he is committing sins and that his parents are dissatisfied with his actions. But if the quarrel is with one of the family members or While the parents are alive, this is a warning of trouble and loss of money. Interpretation of the dream of fighting with someone you love. Commentators differed in the interpretation of the dream of fighting with someone you love in a dream. The imam of the translators, Ibn Sirin, said that a person’s dream is to argue with someone he loves. Others said that a dream of a person arguing with someone he loves indicates that an argument has already occurred in reality. Interpretation of a dream about a quarrel in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a fight in a dream for an unmarried woman is considered an unpleasant thing. Her dreams of arguing with someone she does not know is evidence that many problems will appear in the near future. As for her dreams of arguing with one of her family members, this is an indication of family disputes and judgment between her and the same person. If she sees herself fighting at work, this is evidence of a major problem. In the work environment, you will push her to leave, and to see that she is arguing with a man, this indicates that she will marry him in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a dispute in sleep for a man: A man’s dream of himself in a quarrel with one of his friends is evidence of a real dispute between them. And a man’s dream that he is arguing with his wife, This is evidence of a major disagreement between them that could lead to separation. But if the person who is quarreling with him in a dream quarrels with him in reality, this is good news for him, because there will be peace between them soon, God willing. If the fighting is in the work environment, this is an indication He has many problems at work that may cause him to be fired from his job. God Almighty is the Most High and Most High.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a mouse in an unmarried woman’s dream according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for a single woman It has different meanings depending on the shape and lifestyle of the dreamer, but we do not dispute that mice are creatures that humans do not like, as they are always there at his side to eat what is left of the food, and we find them. People who hate them because of the diseases they transmit to them, so we will find out what they refer to by seeing them in a dream as our article continues today. What is the interpretation of a dream of a mouse in a dream for a single woman? Which - seeing a mouse in a dream for a single woman indicates the need to take care of her life on the one hand. He pursues her and seeks to harm her in life, so she must beware of him and do not let anyone harm her, no matter how close he is. Eating it in a dream does not benefit her, because it leads to a tendency toward forbidden things to gain money quickly, so she must stand up for herself and get rid of this forbidden thing that controls her. If he enters her while she is somewhere, it means that she will travel outside her country for any reason, such as studying or work, but if she finds him inside the house, it means that she is surrounded by thieves who are conspiring against her. . title: Interpretation of accusation of adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the accusation of adultery in a dream For you through one of the encyclopedia sites, the dream of accusing you of prostitution is one of the visions that cause anxiety and tension in the dreamer, as he does not know its meaning and does not know whether it is good or does it indicate evil, so he begins to search for an interpretation of this vision and what it symbolizes, as it is in fact a grave sin. After paragraphs about the great interpreters of dreams, in addition to the difference in the interpretation of the dream. According to the viewer. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin's accusation of adultery in a dream The dream of adultery is a sign of treachery and treachery, or breaking the covenant, or walking in the dark in search of illegitimate gains. Accusation of adultery, where it was stated: When a person sees himself accused of adultery in a dream, this indicates that he is exposed to many problems in reality. If the fortune teller is doing something forbidden, then the accusation of adultery here indicates that he is committing a major obscenity and must stop doing so and repent to God. Ibn Sirin believes that accusing a hot air balloon in a dream indicates the sins committed by the dreamer. Whoever sees himself committing adultery in a dream, this is evidence that in reality he is doing many wrong actions that are punishable by law and forbidden by Sharia. If a person sees in a dream that he is being punished for adultery, this is evidence that he is free from injustice, that he was punished for doing so, and that he repented to God and will not do it again. In the event that a man sees himself committing adultery with the wife of one of his acquaintances or friends, this indicates that the priest wants to get money from this man in any way, even if it is a mistake. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees himself committing adultery with a woman he does not know is considered one of the good visions, as it indicates that the dreamer will receive many benefits and get what he seeks. The woman here is an indication of the good that she was able to obtain. Ibn Sirin narrated that when a man sees himself committing adultery with a man he knows well, this is evidence of the work between them and that there is a joint work between them and he will achieve great success and gain many benefits from it. If a man sees himself committing adultery with a beautiful woman, this is a sign that he will get abundant money in a short time. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s accusation of adultery in a dream Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of adultery in a dream as an expression of an uncle in which the dreamer suffers from personal obsessions and can seduce him, so he must get closer to God and stop committing sin. Ibn Shaheen believes that being accused of adultery in a dream indicates that he is going through a difficult time full of problems with the people around him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is having sex with a deceased relative, this means that many problems and calamities will occur in the dreamer’s life and he will not be able to return to what he was before. Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing adultery with fornication is breaking the womb, and that the time has come to establish kinship, cut off the rift between people, and eliminate all the differences and problems that cause the separation of individuals Her family. Ibn Shaheen explained that whoever sees himself committing adultery with a forbidden woman indicates to him that he will distance himself from her and cut off his relationship with her because of the forbidden things and mistakes she is doing. He sees B
